_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Verses recited by the gods [sn2.30:18.5]: Verse recited by Asama about Pūraṇa Kassapa
Verse recited by Sahalī about Makkhali Gosala
Verse recited by Niṅka about Nigaṇṭha Nātaputta
Verse recited by Ākoṭaka about various sectarian teachers
Verse recited by Vetambarī in reply to Ākoṭaka
Verse recited by Māra after taking possession of Vetambarī
Verse recited by the Buddha in reply to Māra
Verse recited by Māṇavagāmiya about the Buddha
